name: VCampus
overview:
VCampus Corporation provides outsourced e-Learning services. It develops courseware, as well as manages and hosts Internet-based learning environments that help professional credentialing and certification organizations, corporations, government agencies, associations, and individuals. The companyâ€™s services include a range of e-Learning programs, including registration, enrollment, course delivery, custom course development, e-commerce and publishing, as well as tracking of studentsâ€™ progress, reporting of results, and production of certificates of completion. VCampus Corporation offers its products and services through direct sales, the Web, public relations, trade shows, direct mail, trade publications, customers, resellers, and strategic partners.

The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Reston, Virginia.
